title: PLEASE DELETE Agami
abstract: Making a short animation that remind everyone everything has consequences. To make the audience aware that good deed always paid good and bad deeds always paid bad. The consequences are in accordance with the action. Everyone don’t want terrible thing happened to themselves therefore according to the law of cause and effect, if more people familiar with karma concept, more people will do better things to other in their life. Like an old saying our parent say all the time, "We reap what we sow”. Make the audience aware and rethink their action more than usual before doing it because they know the consequences of doing something mean.
creators: WILLIAM TANJAYA; SIENDY INDIRA WINOTO; SHERY KRISTABELLA
source: Skripsi No. 00170003/IDM/2021; William Tanjaya (E12170145), Siendy Indira Winoto (E12180214), Shery Kristabella (E12180110)
